name: UKI-UKI-TENGOKU2
description:
Retro 2D side-scrolling shooter with pixel art. Control a penguin (Laser), a fish (Firebreath), and a human (Railgun) to achieve a high score!

* 2D side-scrolling shooter (5 stages)
* 8 directions and 2 buttons (A-shot, B-blow)
* Two types of bombs (hold B: bomb1, hold AB: bomb2)
* Penguins are birds, so please rise to the surface and breathe periodically.
* Gamepad is recommended....Turn the lever once + A to perform a hidden move.
* Hold A to fix the direction of fire (* can be fine-tuned with →→ or ←←)
* Tilt the direction lever twice to dash and jump.
* Nostalgia. Dot pictures and retro sounds......made by an old man.
* This game may be a music game...the BGMs has a meaning.
* Don't worry. There is no story connection with the previous game "Uki Uki Tengoku(Heaven)".
* No restrictions on distribution of gameplay videos
